  • havoc.autoval.tests.random_error_injection.random_error_injection

Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.random_error_injection.random_error_injection

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

import os
import random
import time

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.host import Host
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_exceptions import TestError
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval import AutovalUtils
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.stressapp_utils import StressappUtils
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.autoval_thread import AutovalThread

"""
    # Supported Error Types
    0x00000008      Memory Correctable
    0x00000010      Memory Uncorrectable non-fatal
    0x00000020      Memory Uncorrectable fatal
    0x00000040      PCI Express Correctable
    0x00000080      PCI Express Uncorrectable non-fatal
    0x00000100      PCI Express Uncorrectable fatal
"""



[docs]class RandomErrorINJectionCheck(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(RandomErrorINJectionCheck, self).__init__()
        self.error_types = self.test_control["error_types"]
        self.bios_settings_ctrl = self.test_control.get("bios_settings", {})
        self.injection_duration = self.test_control.get(
            "injection_duration", 600
        )
        self.min_sleep = self.test_control.get("min_sleep_seconds", 1)
        self.max_sleep = self.test_control.get("max_sleep_seconds", 60)
        self.validate_injection = self.test_control.get(
            "validate_injection", False
        )
        self.stress_tools = self.test_control.get("stress_tools", [])
        self.ab_comparison = self.test_control.get("ab_comparison", False)
        self.mem_uncorrectable_caterr = False



[docs]    def setup(self, config_check=True):
        super(RandomErrorINJectionCheck, self).setup(config_check,
            inband_config_check=False)



[docs]    def execute(self):
        self.log_info("This is the Randomized Error INJection Check Test")
        self.stress_results = {}
        self.original_bios_path = os.path.join(
            self.system_log_dir, "bios_settings_start.dump"
        )
        self.prepare_einj()
        iterations = ["with error injection", "without error injection"]

        for _iter in iterations:
            self.log_info("Starting iteration {}".format(_iter))
            self.stress_results[_iter] = {}
            bg_threads = self.start_stress_tools(_iter)
            try:
                if _iter == "with error injection":
                    if self.stop_injection():
                        self.log_info(
                            "Got max threshold for SleeperStall,\
                            Stopping the Error injection."
                        )
                        break
                    self.inject_errors()
            finally:
                self.wait_for_stress_tools(bg_threads)

        self.result_handler.add_test_results(self.stress_results)
        self.compare_results(iterations)



[docs]    def inject_errors(self):
        errors = {}
        start_time = time.time()
        i = 1
        make = self.host.oob.get_manufacturer().lower()
        while time.time() < start_time + self.injection_duration:
            self.log_info("Injection {}. {} seconds left".format(
                i,
                int(start_time + self.injection_duration - time.time())
            ))
            i += 1
            # Randomly choose an error type and address / port
            error_type = random.choice(self.error_types_to_inject)
            if "memory_uncorrectable" in error_type:
                self.mem_uncorrectable_caterr = True
            if "memory" in error_type:
                mem_addr = random.choice(list(self.mem_addr_map.keys()))
                this_mem_addr_map = {
                    mem_addr: self.mem_addr_map[mem_addr]
                }
                error = self.host.bios.inject_mem_error(
                    error_type,
                    this_mem_addr_map,
                    validate_injection=self.validate_injection,
                    make=make
                )
            elif "pcie" in error_type:
                port = random.choice(self.port_id_list)
                error = self.host.bios.inject_pcie_error(
                    error_type,
                    port_id_list=[port],
                    validate_injection=self.validate_injection
                )
            if error:
                errors[i] = error
            # Random sleep before next iteration
            sleep_time = random.randint(self.min_sleep, self.max_sleep)
            self.log_info(
                "Sleeping {} seconds before next injection".format(sleep_time)
            )
            time.sleep(sleep_time)
        AutovalUtils.validate_empty_list(
            errors, "Check any einj failures '%s'" % errors
        )



[docs]    def prepare_einj(self):
        self.control_settings = self.host.bios.get_einj_bios_settings()
        self.bios_settings = self.control_settings['bios_settings']

        # Update the cfg BIOS settings with control file/CLI settings
        self.bios_settings.update(self.bios_settings_ctrl)

        bios_settings_changed = os.path.join(self.resultsdir,
            self.system_log_dir, "bios_settings_changed.dump"
                                             )
        self.host.bios.update_bios_settings(
            self.bios_settings, bios_settings_changed
        )

        # Get all error types and available addresses / ports to inject on
        self.error_types_to_inject = [k for k, v in self.error_types.items() if v]
        for error_type in self.error_types_to_inject:
            self.host.bios.check_if_error_type_supported(error_type)
        self.mem_addr_map = self.host.bios.get_address_map()
        if "pcie" in error_type:
            params = None
            class_name = None
            remote_module_function = "find_pci_endpoints"
            remote_module = "validation_utils.lib.find_pci_endpoints"

            saved_host = AutovalUtils.get_host()
            AutovalUtils.set_host(self.host)

            self.port_id_list = AutovalUtils.run_remote_module(
                remote_module, remote_module_function, params, class_name
            )
            AutovalUtils.set_host(saved_host)



[docs]    def start_stress_tools(self, tag):
        bg_tests = []
        if "stressapp" in self.stress_tools:
            bg_tests.append(
                AutovalThread.start_autoval_thread(
                    self._start_stressapp_in_bg,
                    tag
                )
            )

        return bg_tests



[docs]    def wait_for_stress_tools(self, bg_threads):
        self.validate_no_exception(
            AutovalThread.wait_for_autoval_thread,
            [bg_threads],
            "Waited for background tests to complete"
        )


    def _start_stressapp_in_bg(self, tag):
        host = Host(self.hosts[0])
        StressappUtils.install_stressapp(host)
        results = StressappUtils.run_stressapp(
            host,
            option_dict={},
            duration=self.injection_duration
        )
        self.stress_results[tag]["stressapp"] = results


[docs]    def compare_results(self, tags):
        comparison = {
            "stressapp": ["total_copy_speed"]
        }

        for tool in self.stress_tools:
            if tool in comparison:
                items = comparison[tool]
                for item in items:
                    self._compare_item(
                        tags, tool, item
                    )


    def _compare_item(self, tags, tool, item):
        for i, tag in enumerate(tags):
            if item not in self.stress_results[tags[i]][tool]:
                raise TestError(
                    "Did not find results for {} item {} for {}".format(
                        tool, item, tag
                    )
                )
        val0 = float(self.stress_results[tags[0]][tool][item])
        val1 = float(self.stress_results[tags[1]][tool][item])
        pct_diff = self.get_pct_diff(val0, val1)
        self.validate_less(
            abs(pct_diff),
            50,
            "Result for {} {}: {}: {}, {}: {}. Percent change: {}".format(
                tool, item, tags[0], val0, tags[1], val1, pct_diff
            ),
            raise_on_fail=False,
        )


[docs]    def get_pct_diff(self, previous, current):
        if current == previous:
            return 0
        try:
            return round(((current - previous) / previous) * 100.0, 2)
        except ZeroDivisionError:
            return 100



[docs]    def stop_injection(self):
        """
            SleeperStall will create file 'stop_sleeper_stall'
            When the stall timer exceeds a threshold value.
        """
        _file = os.path.join(self.dut_logdir, "stop_sleeper_stall")
        ret = self.host.run("ls %s" % _file, get_result_obj=True, ignore_status=True)
        if 0 == ret.return_code:
            return True



[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        self.host.bios.update_bios_setting_from_dump(self.original_bios_path)
        super(RandomErrorINJectionCheck, self).cleanup(
            cfg_filter=["log_util"],
            config_check=True,
            inband_config_check=False,
            config_data=None
        )



[docs]    def on_fail(self):
        super(RandomErrorINJectionCheck, self).on_fail(config_check=True,
                caterr=self.mem_uncorrectable_caterr)




[docs]def main():
    test = RandomErrorINJectionCheck()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
